text: And there passed not five and fifty days, before two of his sons slew him, and they fled into the mountains of Ararat. And That is, Esar-haddon, and so in ver. 22.  Sarchedonus his son reigned in his stead; and he appointed over all the accounts of his kingdom, and over all his affairs, Achiacharus my brother Anaelâ€™s son.
